ygData.subject: RE: Star Rubies
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of gems, what is a pearl for? Got one off a Griffewe, and a vendor offers a bit over a plat for it. Just wondernig if it was good for something else.
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of gems, what is a pearl for? Got one off a Griffewe, and a vendor
offers a bit over a plat for it. Just wondernig if it was good for something
else.

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Sorensen [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 2:22 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Star Rubies


From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>

Those are Rare gems, not purchasable. I haven't found
any yet, but I would expect them to be on 35+
creatures, maybe in Lower guk, etc..

If anyone has more specific information, please post.

Belgarth

--- "Diina, David" <DDiina@...> wrote:
> From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
>
> Can anyone tell me where to buy STAR RUBIES or if
> they are not merchant
> items what mob drops them??? Thanx a lot
